attributes.action: use the idea of eco-towns or new-towns to solve the energy, affordable housing and prison population problem at the same time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is missing an opportunity:
Build a new town, power generation facility and a prison within close proximity to each other.
The proximity to the two facilities will keep house prices affordable as well as solve two of the country's controversial problems.
